productLaunchEvent.title: SkillBridge Product Launch Meetup
productLaunchEvent.description: Join us for the official launch of SkillBridge - our revolutionary platform connecting students with real-world company projects. Be the first to see our platform in action, network with industry professionals, and learn how SkillBridge is transforming the internship experience.

speakers.title: Featured Speakers
speakers.description: Learn from industry experts and the minds behind SkillBridge

aiCourse.title: Modern Software Development with AI
aiCourse.description: Master AI-assisted development with tools like GitHub Copilot, Claude, ChatGPT. Learn about MPC servers, no-code/low-code platforms, and modern IDEs that will revolutionize your workflow and productivity as a developer.
aiCourse.longDescription: This comprehensive course will transform the way you develop software by leveraging the latest AI tools and technologies. You'll learn how to use AI assistants to write better code, understand MPC (Multi-Party Computation) server technology, explore no-code and low-code platforms, and master modern IDEs that boost your productivity.
aiCourse.instructorBio: Alex has over 15 years of software development experience and is a pioneer in AI-assisted development techniques. He's worked with major tech companies to implement AI tools into their development workflows and is passionate about teaching others how to leverage these powerful technologies.
learningPoints: How to effectively use AI coding assistants like GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, and Claude
Understanding MPC (Multi-Party Computation) servers and their applications
No-code and low-code platform development for rapid prototyping
Mastering modern IDEs and productivity tools
Best practices for prompt engineering when working with code-focused LLMs
Building a complete project using AI-assisted development techniques

modules.title: Mastering GitHub Copilot & LLMs for Coding
Capstone Project: Building with AI Assistance

requirementsList: Basic programming knowledge in any language
Computer capable of running modern IDEs
Open mind and willingness to learn new ways of developing software
aiCourse.enrolled: You are already enrolled in this course

hero.title: Bridge the Gap Between Learning and Employment
hero.subtitle: Connect with industry-validated courses and certifications that truly matter to employers
hero.newSubtitle: Platform for internships through real company projects and verified paths to employment

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.point1: Companies struggle to find suitable interns and entry-level talent with real practical skills.
problem.point2: Young people and career-oriented candidates lack easy access to meaningful internships.
problem.point3: Traditional courses don't provide direct connections to real business experience and employment.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description1: SkillBridge is a platform where companies publish real project assignments, accessible as a project board with project requirement assignments. Candidates choose an assignment, develop a solution, and upload it to the system. Approved candidates gain access to a company culture and onboarding course with validation tests.
solution.description2: After the course, the results are sent to the company, which can invite the best candidates for interviews and hiring.

categories.title: Discover Projects by Category
categories.subtitle: Explore opportunities in different industries and find your path

cta.title: Ready to Transform the Internship and Hiring Process?
cta.subtitle: Join SkillBridge today and be part of the future of education and hiring

courses.headerDescription: Browse our library of expert-led courses designed to enhance your skills and advance your career in tech, design, business, and more.
